error.message: Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Call to deprecated function file_upload_max_size(). Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Component\Utility\Environment::getUploadMaxSize() instead.

Usage of deprecated trait Drupal\Core\Routing\UrlGeneratorTrait in class Drupal\media_bulk_upload\MediaBulkConfigPermissions. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Url instead.
Call to deprecated function file_upload_max_size(). Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Component\Utility\Environment::getUploadMaxSize() instead.
Call to deprecated constant FILE_CREATE_DIRECTORY: Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\File\FileSystemInterface::CREATE_DIRECTORY.
Call to deprecated function file_prepare_directory(). Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\File\FileSystemInterface::prepareDirectory().
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to media_bulk_upload.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
A drupal/core requirement is not present in composer.json. Having a composer.json is not a requirement for Drupal 9 compatibility but if there is one, it should include a drupal/core requirement.
